A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a very hard movie to watch. I love Star Wars\, but the humor at first wasn't funny - this wasn't a Marvel movie - and overall I just felt let down\, not because of fan hopes or theories that didn't pan out\, but because it was just a really bad movie in general even if it wasn't Star Wars. It's only doing well because it is Star Wars\, but once word gets out we'll see how it goes. I hope Disney is listening and can salvage whatever is left of this mess. I would like to have watched a good movie\, not whatever this was.
